pullRequest.title: [JBPM-9029] Fix access to swagger.json for KIE Server in Websphere
pullRequest.bodyText: Analogous to controller, it's needed to add a trailing slash plus asterisk in the url-pattern for swagger.json at web.xml to avoid 403 Forbidden error when accessing to that file in Websphere.

nodes.bodyText: Do you need to extend JbpmKieServerBaseIntegrationTest? From my brief looks it seems that you don't need any functionality from there.

commit.message: [JBPM-9029] Fix access to swagger.json in Websphere
